name: Phantom 22
description:
We got only three ships left to destroy the enemy, we put the self destruct on every ship to 22 seconds, so we can deal as much damage as possible! You are our only hope, pilot!

The current build .02 is not complete, your ship can not take damage yet and there is only one phantom at a time in the game (instead of 2 or more). But you are stille able to try to make a highscore with your three lives. 

"I could not believe what was happening in round 2!" 😱
- clickbait thumbnail

Made for #beansjam 22.

Kaddy: Gamedesign, Sounddesign, Art
Seb: Gamedesign, Programming, Music, Art
